DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two part . In part I , participant enrol cohort increase dose level . Participant safety efficacy part I determine dos use Part II . In part II participant enrol one two sequential treatment arm use two dos define part 1 study . Part II 5 cohort , 3 8 milligram per kilogram ( mg/kg ) 2 16 mg/kg . Part I last cohort Part II dose Phase 1/ 2 drug product . The last cohort Part II dose Phase 3 drug product . Both Part I Part II open-label/unmasked .
